channel.title: 317 Client and Source download FOR BEGINNERS!
channel.description:
This is pk jad scape client i took it and edited it a lil bit the home is based in edgeville basic delta source and client. I added the ip addess to 127.0.0.1 so just go to EGUI.java and you wil see 127.0.0.1 erase that and put your ip addess then save and compile and your done
what i added:
.Gs stance
.Shades (drop all whips and spirit shield)
.fixed d claws so they hit more offten
.Took out some uneeded files
That's about it i didnt do much just did a little so its easier on people. plz dont flame this is my first Release...
Server link - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ke2enzmmn4w
Client link - http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?0tohoyjyyyo
========================================-What the server includes-============================================
1. Pk box
2. ::ownerzone
3. ::modzone
4. custom owner shop in ::ownerzone
5. Custom mod/admin shop in ::modzone
6. Has all spirit shields
7. D-claws (hit 4 times and more often) BY ME! 100%
8. I also custom made Skiller shop BY ME! 100%
9. Custom Whip shop by me includes (Dragon whip, Rune whip, adamant whip, gold whip, black whip, and abbysal whip)
10. i reput some things in shops like bandos, dragonfire shield fury and some combat stuff...
And also some other stuff i edited this quite ahwile ago and also dont feel like typeing anymore!
-NOTE- SOME OF THESE PICS ARE FROM PK JAD! AND SOME ARE FROM ME JUST SHOWING YOU WHATS IN THE SERVER AND CLIENT AND WHAT I ADDED!!! DO NOT FLAME PLEASE!!!!!!!
======================================-Pictures Below!-=====================================================
[URL=http://img12.imageshack.us/i/0015r.png/][IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/8478/0015r.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img12.imageshack.us/i/0013y.png/][IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/373/0013y.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img17.imageshack.us/i/customitems.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8273/customitems.png[/img][/URL]
Note this is a d-claws pic before i updated them to hit more offten!
[URL=http://img17.imageshack.us/i/clawsspec.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/6150/clawsspec.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img137.imageshack.us/i/assaultshop.png/][IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/447/assaultshop.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img198.imageshack.us/i/skillersarea.png/][IMG]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/5998/skillersarea.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img198.imageshack.us/i/4ibsrp.png/][IMG]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/9229/4ibsrp.png[/img][/URL]
This is a picture of how many players i had on at one point this was taken about 2 or 3 months ago on this server and client :)
[URL=http://img21.imageshack.us/i/capturecju.png/][IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/7576/capturecju.png[/img][/URL]
Some more customs i forgot about... :)
[URL=http://img30.imageshack.us/i/captureou.png/][IMG]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/9809/captureou.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: 317 Client and Source download FOR BEGINNERS!
item.dc:creator: @josh253 josh253
item.description:
@josh253 wrote:

go to your client folder gfind a folder called egggui.java open it up find the current ip or some thing like this “127.0.01” “127.0.0.1” “127.0.0.1” and change it to your ip after that portforward to get ip u can eathir use ur gateway or use no-ip[quote=“4bob40, post:70, topic:312692”]how do i change ip for server i want to make it public and it’s fun but needs people so can u tell me how to get it public[/quote]

item.title: 317 Client and Source download FOR BEGINNERS!
item.dc:creator: @Chicken_guy Chicken guy
item.description:
@Chicken_guy wrote:

Davidi2:

Customs ruin private servers.

That really depends. Customs like those whips and santas, yes. They’re common and really not that great. Customs like that monkey bag (you can prove me wrong) I haven’t seen before and isn’t common. I’ve been on a server with custom pets. That’s a good thing to put in a server imo. Most of these customs I probably will never use :.

Read full topic
